resources.string: Do you know how the Spanish electricity sector?
Red Electrica de Espa√±a is the public company in charge of distributing and guaranteeing the electricity supply at all times. electricity supply at all times.

In the daily electricity market (the pool) the traders buy the energy they will need and the producers the energy they can offer for each hour of the day. and the producers the energy they can offer for each hour of the day.

The market is based on a marginalist system, it promotes the most efficient energies, since the cheapest ones are the first to enter the pool. the cheapest ones are the first to enter the pool, although in the end they are all paid at the price of the matching point
More than 30% of the energy produced in 2020 was non-renewable, costly and polluting.
